'''1.18.32''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released only for Android, Fire, and Nintendo Switch on May 5-6, 2022, which fixes two performance issues.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/6031356127117|title=Minecraft - 1.18.32 (Android & Switch)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=May 5, 2022}}</ref> This version is compatible with all Bedrock platforms running on [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.30|1.18.30]] and [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.31|1.18.31]].

== Fixes ==
* Improved game performance on certain Android devices ({{bug|MCPE-142934}}).
* Addressed chunk loading and freeze issues in Nintendo Switch ({{bug|MCPE-154110}}).
